Could you resolve the conflict @syed ?
LGTM

I eventually used the *build.sh* script in tools/appliance and got a img.raw

On my existing test cluster I manually overwrite the QCOW2 template on SS and then re-deployed the Secondary Storage VM.

It's 'running' now but the Agent isn't starting yet, which is a systemd thing. Looking into that.

@wido yes, I got it so far as to get serial console (`virsh console <domain>` works) and ssh work. However, when you restart the systemvm (ssvm/cpvm/vr etc) or stop+start the systemvm, it fails ssh login. You're right, something's not right with patching and/or systemd.
LGTM :smile:
@rhtyd it doesn't look like the tests actually kicked off on this one. Thanks...
